column1: #Text=Aang says : " These people have no idea how close they were to getting toasted last night . "
#Text=Toph says : " Yeah , the worst thing about being in disguise is that we do n't get the hero worship anymore .
#Text=You have n't even touched your smoked sea slug .
#Text=" Sokka says : " It 's just , all you guys can do this awesome bending stuff like putting out forest fires , and flying around and making other stuff fly around .
#Text=No one can read a map like you .
#Text=" Toph says : " I ca n't read at all !
#Text=" Aang says : " Yeah , and who keeps us laughing with sarcastic comments all the time ?
#Text=I mean , look at Katara 's hair , right ?
#Text=I was just trying to ... " Sokka says : " Look , I appreciate the effort , but the fact is each of you is so amazing and so special and I 'm ... not .
#Text=I 'm just the guy in the group who 's regular .
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'm sorry you 're feeling so down , but I hope you know , none of us see you that way .
#Text=I know something that 's going to make you feel better .
